author: Qatar Tribune
title: Qatar secures gold in foil event of Arab Fencing Championship in Bahrain - Read Qatar Tribune on the go for unrivalled news coverage
text:
MANAMA: Qatar has claimed gold in the foil event of the Arab Fencing Championship in Bahrain after defeating Bahrain 45-30 in the final.
This victory raises Qatar's tally in the championship to three medals -- two gold and one silver -- after winning gold for the foil team and silver for the men's individual foil event on Wednesday.
The tournament runs through Monday, January 27.
 Copy 24/01/2025 10
